A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When trying to be the darkest starwars film while simultaneously trying to be the funniest\, a lot of the humor takes away from serious and emotionality engaging scenes. Pair that with the up and down pacing and an entire plot line that goes absolutely nowhere. What you are left with is a Star Wars movie that is confused with what it wants to be and fans leaving the theater conflicted on how they should feel.
